SEARCH
Package com.group7.krisefikser.service

Class ItemService

java.lang.Object
com.group7.krisefikser.service.ItemService
@Service public class ItemService extends Object
This class is a service for managing items. It provides methods to get, add, update, delete, sort and filter items. It uses ItemRepo to interact with the database.

  • Method Details

    • getAllItems

      public List<Item> getAllItems()
      Retrieves all items from the repository.
      Returns:
      A list of all items available in the database.

    • getItemById

      public Item getItemById(int id)
      Retrieves an item by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the item to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The item with the specified ID.

    • getItemsByTypes

      public List<Item> getItemsByTypes(List<ItemType> types)
      Retrieves items by their types.
      Parameters:
      types - A list of item types to filter by.
      Returns:
      A list of items that match the specified types.

    • getSortedItems

      public List<Item> getSortedItems(String sortBy, String sortDirection)
      Retrieves all items sorted by the specified criteria.
      Parameters:
      sortBy - The field to sort by (e.g., "calories" or "name").
      sortDirection - The direction of sorting (e.g., "asc" or "desc").
      Returns:
      A list of sorted items.

    • getFilteredAndSortedItems

      public List<Item> getFilteredAndSortedItems(List<ItemType> types, String sortBy, String sortDirection)
      Retrieves items filtered by types and sorted by the specified criteria.
      Parameters:
      types - A list of item types to filter by.
      sortBy - The field to sort by (e.g., "calories" or "name").
      sortDirection - The direction of sorting (e.g., "asc" or "desc").
      Returns:
      A list of filtered and sorted items.

    • searchItemsByName

      public List<Item> searchItemsByName(String searchTerm)
      Searches for items that match the given search term by name. The search is case-insensitive and matches partial item names.
      Parameters:
      searchTerm - The term to search for in item names
      Returns:
      A list of items that match the search term

    • addItem

      public Item addItem(Item item)
      Adds a new item to the repository after validating it. This method ensures that the item meets all validation criteria before delegating the addition to the repository.
      Parameters:
      item - The item to be added. It must contain valid name, unit, calories, and type.
      Returns:
      The added item with its generated ID.

    • updateItem

      public Item updateItem(int id, Item item)
      Updates an existing item in the repository after validating it. This method ensures that the item meets all validation criteria before delegating the update to the repository.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the item to be updated.
      item - The updated item details. It must contain valid name, unit, calories, and type.
      Returns:
      The updated item.

    • deleteItem

      public void deleteItem(int id)
      Deletes an item from the repository by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the item to be deleted.

    • itemExists

      public boolean itemExists(int id)
      Checks if an item exists in the repository by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the item to check.
      Returns:
      true if the item exists, false otherwise.

    • convertToItemResponses

      public List<ItemResponse> convertToItemResponses(List<Item> items)
      Converts a list of Item entities to ItemResponse DTOs.
      Parameters:
      items - The list of Item entities to convert
      Returns:
      A list of corresponding ItemResponse objects

    • convertToItemTypes

      public List<ItemType> convertToItemTypes(List<String> typeStrings)
      Converts a list of type strings to a list of ItemType enums. Invalid type strings are ignored.
      Parameters:
      typeStrings - The list of type strings to convert
      Returns:
      A list of valid ItemType enums

    • addItemFromRequest

      public ItemResponse addItemFromRequest(ItemRequest itemRequest)
      Adds a new item based on the provided ItemRequest. This method handles the conversion from DTO to entity and back to response DTO.
      Parameters:
      itemRequest - The request containing the item details
      Returns:
      The response DTO for the created item

    • updateItemFromRequest

      public ItemResponse updateItemFromRequest(int id, ItemRequest itemRequest)
      Updates an existing item based on the provided ItemRequest. This method handles the conversion from DTO to entity and back to response DTO.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the item to update
      itemRequest - The request containing the updated item details
      Returns:
      The response DTO for the updated item
